import React from "react"; import "../styles/about.css"; function About() { return (

About Us

Maeknit is a design development studio specializing in knitwear and textile creations. We adopt a pragmatic approach, leveraging both in-house and global resources to conceptualize and fulfill our clients' design needs.

Our Commitment

We blend innovation with craftsmanship, integrating new technologies and traditional techniques with a focus on sustainability and social impact.

Our Expertise

  • Sketching, illustration, and flat rendering
  • Draping, pattern-making, and mock-ups
  • Research, concept development, and mood board creation
  • Trend forecasting and artisanal specialization
  • Production-level technical specifications
  • Material sourcing and in-house testing
  • Special projects and mixed media endeavors

Our Collaborations

We collaborate with leading manufacturers worldwide, ensuring quality and precision at every step.

); } export default About;
